tool_description: Screen against myriad of data sources for sanctions, PEPs and criminal watchlists
name: Sanction API
title: Sanction API

api_list.name: generateIndividualReport
generateEntityReport
listSources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sanction-api.p.rapidapi.com/listSources"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sanction-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sanction-api.p.rapidapi.com/listSources"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sanction-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: checkEntity
checkIndividual
api_list.description: The checkIndividual API method searches for individuals that match certain criteria. The client can decide which lists should be included in the search to limit the results to the relevant ones.
